reviewText: With leg locks dominating the Nogi jiujitsu world, this DVD will add some serious tools to your BJJ arsenal. Vladislav's instructions are easy to follow and work into a complete flow. If you have never taken formal instruction in grappling arts such as BJJ, Sambo, or Catch Wrestling,  please be EXTREMELY careful attempting any of these techniques as you can cause SERIOUS injury to yourself and your training partner. If you have had grappling experience, you will gain some serious nuggets of knowledge from this video.
